data.text2: The host nation will provide 25,000 gpd of water from the water treatment plant that will then be run through the ROWPU.
data.text3: Keep in mind that as part of the Initial Water Distribution Package, CE should have received two 600 gph ROWPU units; however, the second unit was damaged during air drop operations and has reduced the site to one functioning unit.
data.text4: Based on this information and the planning factor allocation of 20 gpd per person when water is supplied through a Harvest Falcon water system, will there be enough water for drinking, showering, and food preparation (after the water is treated with the ROWPU) for the 500 personnel that will be on this installation?
